    handleKeyEvent(int, int, char, int) - Method in class com.tablr.controller.UIController
    Handles key events and delegates the appropriate user actions to the AppController.
    handleKeyEvent(int, int, char, int) - Method in class com.tablr.view.CanvasWindow
    Called when the user presses a key (id == KeyEvent.KEY_PRESSED) or enters a character (id == KeyEvent.KEY_TYPED).
    handleMouseEvent(int, int, int, int) - Method in class com.tablr.controller.UIController
    Handles mouse click events and delegates them to the AppController.
    handleMouseEvent(int, int, int, int) - Method in class com.tablr.view.CanvasWindow
    Called when the user presses (id == MouseEvent.MOUSE_PRESSED), releases (id == MouseEvent.MOUSE_RELEASED), or drags (id == MouseEvent.MOUSE_DRAGGED) the mouse.
